text:
Hello everyone !

Is it possible to individually rename custom modules in the creation of a page?
I also created a module_name field but I haven't found a way to link it to the name displayed on the screenshoot.

Do you have a solution for this kind of feature ?

Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
That’s a nice idea - sort of like an internal page-editor name. May be worth adding to the ideas forum?

Oh please add it to the ideas forum and provide a link and i will upvote it! i keep forgetting to ask about that, and it would help us out IMMENSELY on our resource lists that have 30 of the same module.

Hi Antoine! I’m the product designer on the editor platform and I’m so happy you brought this up, since it’s currently something we’re working on improving. Would love to hear more thoughts on how you use the contents tab and run some ideas and mocks by you. Would you be willing to jump on a call sometime this week or whenever you’re available?
